Package api

Class DWGraph_Algo

java.lang.Object
api.DWGraph_Algo
All Implemented Interfaces:
dw_graph_algorithms
public class DWGraph_Algo
extends java.lang.Object
implements dw_graph_algorithms
this class present all the algorithms that can make on graph find the shortest path from one node to another save to information of the current graph on file and load from file the information of graph
Author:
liadn7, avielc11

      public boolean isConnected()
      Specified by:
      isConnected in interface dw_graph_algorithms
      Returns:
      true if and only if (iff) there is a valid path from each node to each other node. NOTE: assume directional graph (all n*(n-1) ordered pairs).

    • shortestPath

      public java.util.List<node_data> shortestPath​(int src, int dest)
      Description copied from interface: dw_graph_algorithms
      see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shortest_path_problem
      Specified by:
      shortestPath in interface dw_graph_algorithms
      Parameters:
      src - - start node
      dest - - end (target) node
      Returns:
      the the shortest path between src to dest - as an ordered List of nodes: src... n1... n2...dest Note if no such path returns null;

    • load

      public boolean load​(java.lang.String file)
      Description copied from interface: dw_graph_algorithms
      This method load a graph to this graph algorithm. if the file was successfully loaded - the underlying graph of this class will be changed (to the loaded one), in case the graph was not loaded the original graph should remain "as is".
      Specified by:
      load in interface dw_graph_algorithms
      Parameters:
      file - - file name of JSON file
      Returns:
      true - iff the graph was successfully loaded.
